GetSetPromotionItemList.Statement: SELECT w2_SetPromotion.*, w2_SetPromotionItem.* FROM w2_SetPromotion INNER JOIN w2_SetPromotionItem ON ( w2_SetPromotion.setpromotion_id = w2_SetPromotionItem.setpromotion_id ) WHERE w2_SetPromotion.valid_flg = '1' AND ISNULL(w2_SetPromotion.end_date, GETDATE()) >= GETDATE() ORDER BY w2_SetPromotion.display_order, w2_SetPromotion.setpromotion_id
